channel.title: uv-notes on Petfactory
channel.description: Recent content in uv-notes on Petfactory

item.title: Houdini - UV
item.description: Vieport display options Open the vieport display option dialog (press D over the viewport) Markers tab > Vertices > UV Overlap Displays the overlap in red (in the UV view) UV Flatten Rectify Add a uv flatten node Under the section Flattening Constraints > Rectify Group type * UV Layout Target Assignment (UDIM) To force specific primitives to a specific UDIM we can use a primitive attr to specify which one.
